Reviews.Title: Great Product.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I recommend those who like to be outdoors and is very photogenic. I plan to take this to the oceans of Hawaii.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working on third day!
Reviews.Author: John Schmerker
Reviews.Content: Everything looked great when I got it.  Took it in the pool once, then on a short snorkel trip during which it took beautiful pictures.  I never opened the ports or battery case during this time.  On a second foray into the ocean the buttons onthe camera stopped working. I could not adjust the settings or zoom.  Forced to return and I hope I get my money back!

Reviews.Title: waterproof?
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I took it in 5 ft of water and it would not come on.  I got out, double checked the locks, everything was locked.  When I opened the camera to get the SD card out,  I got a lot of water also.  Very disappointed.  Lets see if Olympus replaces it.
